actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE pipeline_master
SET
camera_id ={{camera1.selectedOptionValue}},
model_id ={{model1.selectedOptionValue}},
processing_type ={{processing1.selectedOptionValue}},
skip_frames ={{skipframes1.selectedOptionValue}},
do_tracking ={{Checkbox1.isChecked?1:0}},
zone_flag ={{Checkbox2.isChecked?1:0}},
zone_topleft_x ={{Input3.text}},
zone_topleft_y ={{Input4.text}},
zone_botright_x ={{Input5.text}},
zone_botright_y ={{Input6.text}},
status = {{Switch1.isSwitchedOn?"Active":"Inactive"}},
edited_by = {{Text15.text}},
edited_date = current_timestamp()
WHERE pipeline_id = {{Table1.selectedRow.pipeline_id }};
